title: Stalker's Quiver
summaries: The Stalker's Quiver is a Hardmode accessory that combines the effects of the Magic Quiver and the aggro-reducing effect of the Putrid Scent. Unlike the general ranged damage bonuses, it only boosts the damage of the weapons and does not affect damage of the ammo.

Like other accessories crafted with the Putrid Scent, it does not inherit the Putrid Scent's bonus to damage and critical strike chance. It could be seen as the corruption-equivalent to the Berserker's Glove.
